rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports actions factually ('quarantined', 'will be depopulated') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment uses containment verbs ('quarantined', 'depopulated') which are Neutral per rules, even with implied scale.
The segment reports quarantine and depopulation but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
